column3: The way in which hair is styled or cut.
A decorative cosmetic product, typically applied to the eyelids and used to enhance and define the eyes.
A cosmetic cream or powder used for coloring the cheeks to give a rosy complexion.
A liquid or paste applied to nails in order to color them.
Clothing items such as jewelry, scarves, belts, hats, etc.
A piece of jewelry worn around the wrist.
A piece of jewelry worn in the ears.
